constituent: lie, say, words, keitai, mouth, saw
heisigStory: The lie in this character refers to falsehoods and fibs. Its elements: words . . . saw.
koohiiStory1: Pinnochio gets frustrated that every time he utters a word of a lie, his nose grows and he has to get the saw out again.
koohiiStory2: Her lies are words that cut not like a knife, no not cleanly, but savagely like a saw.
